Title: Prohibits data brokers from selling the personal information of current and former military servicemembers
Summary: Prohibits data brokers from selling the personal information of current and former military servicemembers or their households without consent.
LawCode: Add ยง399-jj, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting data brokers from selling the personal information of current and former military servicemembers
